{"id":940741088,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1682619158,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"35 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/940741088/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"44.6 MB","code":"\n// TC -> O(|s|*|p|)\n// SC -> O(|s|*|p|)\n\nclass Solution {\n    public boolean isMatch(String s, String p) {\n        return solve(s,p,0,0,new Boolean[s.length()][p.length()]);\n    }\n\n    private boolean solve(String s,String t,int i,int j,Boolean[][] dp){\n        if(i==s.length()){\n            return hasNoLCLeft(t,j);\n        }\n        if(j==t.length()){\n            return i==s.length();\n        }\n        if(dp[i][j]!=null){\n            return dp[i][j];\n        }\n        if(Character.isLowerCase(t.charAt(j)) && s.charAt(i)!=t.charAt(j)){\n            return dp[i][j] = false;\n        }\n        if(t.charAt(j)=='*'){\n            if(solve(s,t,i+1,j,dp)){\n                return true;\n            }\n            if(solve(s,t,i,j+1,dp)){\n                return true;\n            }\n        }\n        return dp[i][j] = solve(s,t,i+1,j+1,dp)? true: false;\n    }\n\n\n    private boolean hasNoLCLeft(String t,int j){\n        for(int i=j;i<t.length();i++){\n            if(t.charAt(i)!='*'){\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false}
